text: Joseph N'Singa Udjuu Ongwabeki Untubwe (29 September 1934 â€“ 24 February 2021) was a Congolese politician. He was the First State Commissioner of Zaire from 23 April 1981 to 5 November 1982. From 1966 to 1969, he also served as Minister of Justice. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Government ministers Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo politicians
title: N'Singa Udjuu
